ResourceHeader.Description: The VLF/ELF crossed loop antenna was settled at this observatory (AUGSO) which is 40 km apart from the campus of Athabasca University in February 2012 by Prof. Shiokawa of ISEE. Collaborators of this observatory: U. Athabasca/Kanazawa U.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please contact the principal investigator (PI) of the ISEE VLF/ELF observation, Prof. K. Shiokawa (shiokawa at isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp) before using the data. The routine observation at Athabasca is carried out at the AUGSO observatory of Athabasca University. We thank Prof. Martin Connors, Dr. Ian Scofield, and all the staffs of the Athabasca University.

InformationURL.Name: ISEE VLF/ELF Data
InformationURL.Description: The history of the configuration and quick-look data are available. All the plotted data and images are just for browsing purpose and are not fully calibrated. Please do not use the data at any presentations and publications without contacting the PI.
